content: Facing the Keeper's Shrine, fly up from it and look to the right. Get as high as you can, and you'll see a large rock. Head straight toward it and over it, then continue past and turn slightly to the right again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rhino Watch Slope'.
The content is as follows:
Facing the Keeper's Shrine, fly up from it and look to the right. Get as high as you can, and you'll see a large rock. Head straight toward it and over it, then continue past and turn slightly to the right again.
